headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Move on up to a deluxe Casino Penthouse in the sky for 30% off this week — same goes for all the Upgrades and Modifications. Plus, there are also discounts on a range of vehicles and weapons including:

- Albany Lurcher – 40% off
- Rune Zhaba – 40% off
- Bravado Gauntlet Hellfire – 30% off
- Widowmaker – 50% off

And more! Visit the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
